author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Taking a Hard Line
President Trump called Syrian President Bashar al-Assad an “animal” and warned him—as well as his allies Russia and Iran—of a “big price” to pay for a suspected chemical attack that killed dozens of civilians in a rebel-held Syrian town on Saturday. The U.K. and France both denounced the alleged chemical attack as an unconscionable crime, while Russia called the report a “hoax” and warned the U.S. against any military response. Medical professionals and human-rights groups said the alleged chemical...
